title: Inside Passenger Train Vol.2
description: Inside Passenger Train Vol.2 is a set of sounds recorded inside a compartment car of a passenger express train.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

This sound pack includes:

  • Inside in Carriage Passing by Oncoming Train Loops
  • Inside Moving Train Loops
  • Opening and Closing Compartment Door Passenger Train Car
  • Train Interior Slow Speed Loops
  • Train Wheels Loops
  • Trains Bonus

Inside Passenger Train Vol.2 - Sound List

With these looped sounds you can easily create the atmosphere inside the train while it is moving.

Recorded and mixed in 96 kHz/24 Bit WAV format.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 94

Number of Audio Cues: 94

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 105 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
